Thời gian làm việc:  từ 08h30-17h30 từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 hàng tuần 

Phúc lợi:

  • Cung cấp đầy đủ trang thiết bị làm việc (dàn máy macmini M2 ~50tr)
  • Đảm bảo đầy đủ các chế độ phúc lợi theo quy định của Luật quy định.
  • Phụ cấp ăn trưa 1.000.000 VNĐ/tháng (ngoài lương cứng)
  • Lương Tháng 13, Thưởng doanh thu 4 quý/năm, thưởng nóng, thưởng dự án, thưởng thẻ ghi nhận…
  • Được làm việc trong môi trường làm việc năng động, nhiều cơ hội phát triển.
  • 1 năm review lại mức lương 2 lần, hoặc tăng đột xuất khi có hiệu quả công việc tốt
  • Được tham gia các hoạt động thường niên: Teambuilding và du lịch, sinh nhật hàng tháng, 8/3, 20/10, Noel, Men’s day,…và rất nhiều hoạt động khác.

YeuCau:
• A strong background in mathematics, statistics, computer science, data science, or programming.
  • Prefer commercial or published experience in NLP solutions, whether it is conversational AI, information extraction, text summarization, text completion, or sentiment analysis.
  • Familiarity with the scientific Python stack: numpy, matplotlib/seaborn, pandas, scikitlearn, Jupyter notebook, etc.
  • Experience in some of the following tools in the NLP stack: LangChain, vector embeddings, NLTK, spaCy, Stanford CoreNLP, word2vec, glove, GPT-2, GPT-3, gpt-4, ChatGPT, Bard, Claude, LLaMA, LaMDA, Alpaca, fastText, Google BERT, gensim.
  • Willing to work and wrangle with messy and incomplete data. Comfortable with SQL and Unix (MacOS or Linux command line).
  • Education: We prefer a degree in science, computer science, mathematics, statistics or economics from a top Vietnamese or foreign university.
  • Excellent logic skills.
  • Good verbal and excellent written English communications skills.
  • Prefer experience working in an agile development environment using eXtreme Programming and/or SCRUM.
  • Willing to work closely and continuously with other researchers and programmers, almost never working alone
MoTa:
You are a software developer who is excited about generative AI. SkyDeck.ai is a rapidly evolving enterprise AI productivity platform. Your role will revolve around building applications and agents running on large language models (LLMs), including but not limited to GPT-3.5, GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, Google Vertex AI. 

As a Generative AI Developer, you will be responsible for keeping up to date on state-ofthe-art methods as they become published and invented. You will develop novel methods and processes to enable autonomous AI. You should be able to rapidly develop production ready professional Python code to implement new capabilities every week. 

You should possess an understanding of how to develop effective conditioning text or context and code around generative text models to produce specialized applications. You should be able to use LLMs to support your own software development, to define business processes in unfamiliar industries, and to implement complex autonomous workflows. 

You will also familiarize yourself with eXtreme Programming (XP) and Scrum agile development methods, including paired programming, Behavior Driven Development (BDD), Test Driven Development (TDD), and emergent business-value prioritized development. 

This role provides an exceptional opportunity for growth as we continue to evolve our venture, offering a wealth of enterprise-ready tools and capabilities to our users. 

You should only apply for this position if you have a strong background in some or all of the following: computer science, mathematics, statistics, data science, programming
PhucLoi:
The East Agile Experience includes:

(1) ability to transfer between our offices in Ha Noi, Ho Chi Minh City, and Da Nang,
(2) 15 days annual leave,
(3) excellent health insurance,
(4) a 40-hour regular work week with little or no after-hours work requirements,
(5) end-of-year Tet bonus,
(6) a fun and flexible working environment in a modern office,
(7) free office lunch,
(8) salary reviews every 6 months,
(9) business trips for meetings with clients in North America.

YeuCau:
I. Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn :

1. Có kinh nghiệm test API , Database , Mobile.

2. Có kinh nghiệm design test case , test plan và làm tài liệu test.

3. Có kinh nghiệm phân tích và làm rõ yêu cầu từ dự án.

4. Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong mảng Manual Test hoặc Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên trong lĩnh vực Automation Test

II. Yêu cầu khác :

- Skill giải quyết vấn đề với dev

- Khả năng chịu áp lực trong công việc

- Sẵn sàng học thêm các skill mới trong công việc như automation test, performance test ,..
MoTa:

YeuCau:
Job Requirements:

  • Proven experience in quality control, quality assurance, or software testing, with at least 3 years of experience.
  • In-depth knowledge of payment technology and associated industry standards and regulations is a plus.
  • Proficiency in quality control tools, test automation (like Cypress), and defect tracking systems.
  • Have leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and mentor a diverse team is a plus
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with attention to detail.
  • Effective communication and collaboration abilities to work with cross-functional teams.
  • Strong project management skills, including the ability to prioritize tasks and meet tight deadlines.
  • Familiarity with Business Analysis (BA) principles, including requirements gathering and documentation.
MoTa:
About the company

Tadidi JV JSC is a shareholder between Australia & Vietnam with more than 15 years of experience in e-commerce & technical solutions in hospitality.

We are running 3 big projects, including:

1/ Hotel Link - a leading company in providing digital solutions for hotels

2/ Kovena - a solution of frictionless payment experience for guests and accommodation providers.

3/ Designer Journeys - A Customize tour company to make you have unique journeys according to your desire.

……………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………………….

We are seeking a highly skilled and young Senior QA QC/ Tester to join our dynamic tech product company (Kovena.com) in the fast-paced world of payment technology. The Senior QC Engineer will play a critical role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our payment solutions, helping us maintain our industry-leading standards and deliver exceptional products to our clients.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Quality Assurance Oversight
    + Develop, implement, and maintain a comprehensive quality control program for all payment products and services.
    + Create and execute quality assurance processes and methodologies to identify and address defects or issues throughout the product development life cycle.
     
  • Have a mindset of Team Leadership
    + When the team is growing, you may lead and mentor a team of quality control professionals, providing guidance and support in achieving departmental goals.
    + Conduct regular performance evaluations, offer feedback, and support professional development within the team.
     
  • Quality Control Strategy
    + Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product development, engineering, and product management, to define quality control strategies that align with business objectives.
    + Define, track, and report on key performance indicators related to product quality.
     
  • Test Planning and Execution
    + Develop test plans, test cases, and testing methodologies to ensure the thorough evaluation of payment solutions.
    + Execute and oversee testing activities, including functional, regression, and performance testing.
     
  • Issue Identification and Resolution
    + Identify, document, and prioritize defects, anomalies, and issues in products and services.
    + Work closely with development teams to track and resolve quality-related issues, ensuring timely and effective solutions.
     
  • Documentation and Reporting
    + Maintain detailed records of quality control activities, test results, and issue resolutions.
    + Generate reports to communicate quality performance metrics to relevant stakeholders.
     
  • Process Improvement
    + Continuously evaluate and enhance quality control processes and procedures to optimize efficiency and effectiveness.
    + Stay up-to-date with industry best practices and technological advancements in payment solutions.
PhucLoi:

  • 14 annual leaves in a year: 12 annual leaves plus 1 day off in the month of birthday plus 1 day off on Christmas.

  • Many parties: Mid-Autumn festival, Christmas Day, New Year….
  • SHUI & PIT based on full paid salary.
  • Modern Office with full equipment.
  • Free tea & snacks in the pantry. 
  • Company trip every year.
  • Hybrid working

  • Has experienced testing of Web Service and Mobile Application: 3 years or above
  • Has experienced developing test cases, executing test and reporting test results
  • Has experienced tests relevant in  Security or Performance
  • Japanese N1/N2
  • Ability to communicate well in development projects

Nice to have:

  • Good at English communication
  • Working experience in Japanese projects as QA/QC
  • Able to grasp trends and research new technologies
  • Experience working for web development related companies
MoTa:
The Opportunity

As our business continues to grow, we are looking for Japanese Test Designer who can contribute to manual test case management, communicate with relating stakeholder and develop the application in cooperation with the product manager, working in the form of Squad, a small team can quickly and consistently engage in everything from design to development, testing and operation.

Job Scope

  • Performing test analysis, design and execution of  web and mobile applications
  • Creating test reports
  • Having a high awareness of product quality, such as improving system requirement definition accuracy and improving UAT process, while creating and implementing under your own plan
  • By being involved in the early stages of a project, detecting and responding quickly to risk factors such as bugs and schedules.
  • Planning and implementing measures to prevent recurrence of problems

Development environment

  • Automation test: Autify
  • Backend: Ruby(on Rails), Go, Amazon Aurora(MySQL), Elasticsearch, DynamoDB
  • FrontEnd: Nuxt.js/Vue.js, ReactJS
  • Mobile App: Kotlin, Swift, Flutter
  • Deploy/ Build: CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CircleCI, GitHub Actions
  • Others: swagger, Docker, ZenHub, Figma
PhucLoi:
• Great salary package.
  • Annual performance review: twice/ year.
  • Performance Bonus for all staff.

TenCV: Front End Web Developer (Angular, Typescript, RxJS)

    Angular, TypeScript, HTML, RxJs and CSS technologies and Implementing REST APIs
  • Experience with Angular Universal / SSR and Real-time APIs like SocketIO or SignalR for chat based applications
  • Experience building dashboards using HighCharts or similar library a big plus

MoTa:
We're looking for an exceptionally talented front-end web developer who's specialized in Angular/Typescript/RxJS and CSS to help build the next version of our popular learning and collaboration SaaS platform. You’ll be part of a fast growing, cross-functional team based in Ho Chi Minh City that’s responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.

You'll work closely with our front-end and back-end developers, and interact directly with customers to understand how they're using the product and help identify requirements for new features and ways we can optimise existing features.

If you're a fast learner, motivated by user happiness, have a good sense of UX design and ready for a challenge then we’d like to meet you.

Responsibilities

• Take charge of the front-end development team based in HCMC
• Implement new features from scratch
• Enhance existing features to improve performance and security
• Bug fixes
• Attend customer meetings to understand how they're using the platform and identify ways in which we can improve
PhucLoi:
We're focused on building products that customers love using, and to do that we need to make sure you love working at Avnon so that you can focus and do your best work - so you'll have a high quality work environment, excellent management and a clear understanding of what your job needs to focus on.

We'll support you with training, growth opportunities, trips to our office in Singapore and exposure to the latest technologies and interesting challenges.

Aimesoft là nơi quy tụ những chuyên gia ứng dụng AI nhằm giải quyết những vấn đề thực tiễn. Sứ mệnh của Aimesoft là đồng hành trong đời sống con người thông qua các ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo đa thể thức chân thực và sống động. Tài sản lớn nhất của Aimesoft là đội ngũ hơn 50 chuyên gia và kĩ sư nghiên cứu với nền tảng lập trình vững chắc và kinh nghiệm thực chiến các dự án “khó nhằn”. Dưới sự dẫn dắt của TS. Nguyễn Tuấn Đức (CEO) và cố vấn của các chuyên gia đến từ Đại học Tokyo, Nhật Bản, Aimesoft đang có những bước chuyển mình mạnh mẽ nhằm khẳng định vị trí số 1 về cung cấp giải pháp ứng dụng Trí tuệ nhân tạo.

Hiện tại, Aimesoft đang tìm kiếm các Kỹ sư xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên (NLP Engineer) và nhiều vị trí khác để tham gia vào đội ngũ kĩ sư tài năng của chúng tôi.

YeuCau:
Requirements and skills

MoTa:
Senior Database Administrator job description

A professional Database Administrator (DBA) will keep the database up and running smoothly 24/7. The goal is to provide a seamless flow of information throughout the company, considering both backend data structure and frontend accessibility for end-users.

Duties and responsibilities

  • Monitor and issue resolution of both in Production and Integration Environments.
  • Health and support database services to ensure the highest standards of availability, resilience, integrity, security, tuning and performance.
  • Support the development team in all database systems integration and troubleshooting issues
  • Participate to transformation and architecture projects: There will be many architecture improvements and technical challenges, we are going forward on Google Cloud and we are a fast growing IT company.
  • Understanding data model, business logic and customer data.
  • Perform SQL tuning and sql query optimization, Linux shell script can be written to execute any database tasks (any linux shell or python, golang script)
  • Setting up, installing, designing, and architecting database technologies: Oracle (Guard, RAC), PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL and database system monitoring tools
  • Skilled in consulting on database selection criteria for projects or development teams

Working Environment

  • Quarterly/yearly teambuilding & engaged internal events.

YeuCau:

  • Knowing front-end language (Angular/React/HTML/CSS) is a plus.

MoTa:
HRS is reinventing how businesses and governments work, stay and pay in today’s dynamic global marketplace. HRS’ advanced platform technology extends its reach beyond hospitality to meetings, office space management, payment efficiency and crisis recovery.

Beyond cost savings in the global post-pandemic economy, HRS clients gain from an unrivaled focus on essential aspects including safety, security and satisfaction.

HRS is also recognized for its award-winning Green Stay Initiative, technology that helps corporate hotel programs achieve their NetZero targets, and its groundbreaking Crew & Passengers Solution, which leverages automation to elevate experiences for air and rail operations.

Founded in 1972, HRS works with 35 percent of the global Fortune 500 and the world’s leading hotel chains, regional hospitality groups and payment providers.

BUSINESS UNIT

With HRS Crew & Passenger Solutions, we support global transportation companies (airlines, railroads and logistics companies) in digital transformation in accommodation, savings and process automation with a fully customer-centric approach. Our solution targets crew members operating an aircraft, train or ship and accommodates stranded passengers when a flight or train is disrupted. As a modular platform, our solution covers all accommodation and logistics needs across the customer's end-to-end journey: from procurement, accommodation planning and operations, to hotel stay, communication management, payment and billing. This not only benefits the end user, but also delivers significant cost, process and time savings for operational departments. 

POSITION

  • Participate in requirement analysis.
  • Write clean, testable, and scalable code using .NET programming languages.
  • Test and deploy applications and systems.
  • Review, update, refactor and debug code.
  • Improve/upgrade existing programs.
  • Develop documentation throughout the software development lifecycle.

  • Full salary and benefits as an official employee on probation.
  • 13th-month salary & short-term incentives: we offer incentives as defined by the company’s success in the previous year.

  • Supportive working conditions: Laptop, MS Surface Hub.
  • Free and unlimited snacks, tea, coffee, and by-choice request.
  • Premium company trip & business traveling programs and other exciting activities.

• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent major.
  • 3+ years of experience in software development with Golang.
  • Understanding of design patterns, software engineering principles/ best practices such as SOLID.
  • Good communication in English (intermediate level and above).

MoTa:
Ekino, powered by HavasCX, is a French company specialised in Conception, Design, Development and Maintenance of digital solutions: Digital Platforms, Websites, Mobile Applications.

We are part of the Havas/ Vivendi Group. We work with other agencies in the network or directly with Asian, European and American clients. 

HavasCX is the global network brand, bringing together over 1,200 specialists in digital transformation, eCommerce, customer experience design and customer acquisition and engagement from Havas’ global and local agencies. 

We build innovative solutions from the ground up with open technologies. Our solutions are integrated with legacy systems (e-commerce, billing, provisioning, leads, CRM,...) and help business and digital managers to meet their objectives.

We provide our services to large French and international groups. Projects range from 50 to 1000 days of development.

The Ekino Group is composed of 700 consultants and technical experts, located in France (Paris & Bordeaux), Vietnam (Ho Chi Minh City), United Kingdom (London), Singapore, India and USA (New York).

ekino in Vietnam

Ekino has been operating in Ho Chi Minh City since 2013, with around 200 employees.

We are specialised in Sage X3, Digital Architecture, eCommerce, Web Platforms, Mobile and Responsive Apps; Agile Development; ReactJS; AngularJS; NodeJS; Java; .Net; PHP (Symfony, WordPress, Drupal, Magento 2), User Experience, User Interface, Service Design; Cloud Services, DevOps.

Senior Golang Developer

Job description

  • Analyze requirements, come up with adequate technical design, and maintain software enhancements and/or new products.
  • Assist in defining system requirements and/or necessary modifications.
  • Write clean and maintainable code following engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, continuous integration, design patterns, etc.).
  • Perform testing and debugging of applications.
  • Assist other team members with design challenges and coding issues; and evaluate their performance.

  • Clear career path: define your career development with long-term vision
  • Be secured in your mind with employee’s care: private healthcare insurance package, medical check-up, support allowance...
  • Great-place-to-work activities (company trip, sport clubs...): enhance teamwork spirit and facilitate your work-life harmony

  • You continuously stay up-to-date with industry trends, tools, and frameworks.

Organization

  • You have excellent time management and work organization skills.

Communication

  • You have an English Professional working proficiency.
  • You have great listening and cross-functional collaboration skills.
  • You are used to working closely with Engineers to see through the correct implementation of your designs.

What does a typical workday look like?

Although each day is usually different and presents its own challenges, there are common themes that you will face every day.

  • Discovering new projects, understanding the pain points and users’ expectations, and defining how to approach the problems or innovations through user experience.
  • Designing, wireframing, prototyping.
  • Supporting Engineering with design implementation.
  • Interacting with Product Managers and iterating on designs.
  • Interacting with external stakeholders, listening to and understanding their feedback while defending your design decisions.
  • Reporting and providing insights to the Chief Product Officer.
  • Identifying and leading new design initiatives.

Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us on project management! 

You have project management skills, 3 years of experience in Agile, Scrum, Kanban environments, you’re technically savvy and have a good grasp on critical thinking and design thinking? Are you also interested in e-commerce and like to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform’s growth and join our team! We are looking for you!

WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!

  • Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within the scope and team resource
  • Coordinate the Team - You will communicate with different people on our team (developers, business, designers etc.) to ensure that roadblocks are removed and issues are closed quickly
  • Ensure quality - Ensuring we have the right level of scope and coverage per epic and regression failures are protected against together with QA team
  • Continuous Improvement - Identifying and driving areas where the team and process can improve the way we deliver on high-quality release
  • Ensure resource availability and allocation
  • Develop a detailed project plan to track progress
  • Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
  • Measure project performance using appropriate systems, tools, and techniques
  • Report and escalate to management as needed
  • Manage the relationship with stakeholders
  • Perform risk management to minimize project risks

Such a job isn’t easy, especially with a focus on good project management practices. But that is ok. We aren’t here for ease anyway. We are here for people who want to operate at the next level in their careers.
PhucLoi:
WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!

We at Parcel Perform are dedicated to being a platform for growth for all our team members, regardless of function and location. 

  • The opportunity to work in a fast-growing, super exciting and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry. You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide. 
  • The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you being a critical driver behind the success of us achieving our mission. 
  • An environment where everybody never stops growing and focuses on succeeding - we continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important dimensions and look at ways for you to address them and further your development 
  • Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform journey, where you will work with and alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.

WHO ARE WE AT PARCEL PERFORM! 

Parcel Perform is a global SaaS company for the e-commerce logistics industry that aims to excel and optimize their customers’ end-to-end logistics experience worldwide. We are changing the way e-commerce logistics is built. Through our technology platform, we provide innovative e-commerce logistics management for companies. With 2,000+ customers globally, international investors like Wavemaker Partners and 500 Startups, we are the go-to technology software for e-commerce logistics. 

We are an international, dynamic and fast-growing team that’s excited about e-commerce and logistics and the opportunity to transform these industries with data and technology. Our team of 40+ experts are mainly based in Singapore, Germany, Vietnam and the United States, serving global customers with a unique technology solution worldwide. We are driven and strive to build an excellent product that we sell passionately around the globe.

Our motto: “With hustle and heart, everything is possible.” 

Join us, if you have the same passion, if you want to continuously learn and change the way e-commerce logistics is built. Hit the apply button and tell us why you would be the perfect candidate for this role and how you will help us in our pursuit of becoming the world’s best e-commerce logistics management platform.

YeuCau:
The Role and Expectations

In the Software Engineer role for our Travel Team, you will have the opportunity to contribute significantly to building and enhancing our innovative SaaS-based travel platform. We value a proactive approach and eagerness for team collaboration. Your role will require a balance of both front-end and back-end skills.

 

  • Work closely with fellow like-minded engineers on our hotels, cars, flights booking platform used by millions of our customers worldwide
  • Engage closely with our designers, product owners, and other engineers in developing travel experiences like classified room images, payment construct and methods integrations for users in different parts of the world.
  • Adhere to and practice engineering best practices within the team - such as code reviews, API integration tests, writing our solutions in a maintainable manner.
  • Increase our platform’s speed and flexibility so that our architecture stays ahead of user scale and checkout volumes.

Who we are looking for:

  • 3 years of solid programming experience, including front-end and back-end development
  • Proficiency in at least one frontend language, preferably Typescript
  • Experience in building frontends, either using vanilla JS or specific frameworks (Angular, React)
  • A fast learner with curiosity to learn & explore new languages and libraries - plumbing the depths of our stack and frameworks used are key in enabling optimisations for scale
  • Strong communication: articulate complex ideas in a simple, relatable style
  • A team player with a collaborative approach and willingness to assist others
MoTa:
Nice to Meet You! We are Ascenda

Ascenda revolutionizes loyalty solutions for fintechs, financial institutions, and loyalty alliances globally. We pride ourselves on pushing boundaries, offering beautiful, functional, and fast-implementing designs that provide exceptional customer benefits.

 

About Ascenda Travel

Ascenda Travel was born in 2015 as Kaligo.com when we first started powering highly rewarding loyalty points earn for customers on their hotel stays; We now host 700,000+ hotels, 100,000+ flights powering the stays & redemptions for millions of customers across our plethora of B2B team-ups globally.

 

Our mission today is to deliver the best in class customer experience & varied selection of cars, hotels & flight bookings.


 

Engineering excellence is our edge

We take great pride in building world-class software products that derive their success from beautiful architecture, high performance, ease of use and solid security in-depth.

 

Our teams are passionate about great code and global scalability. The technical problems we are most excited to solve go far beyond our current areas of expertise, which motivates us to push the limits and expand our own horizon every day. Work with problems like:

 

  • Billions of points earn & burn yearly
  • Millions of spend data along with a multitude of user segments daily
  • Maintaining & securing thousands of customer sessions across platforms
PhucLoi:
Benefits:

We have a REWARDING WORKPLACE that provides

  • High growth environment & exponential career development
  • Mobile & flexible work environment
  • Competitive compensation
  • Travel perks & Employee rewards
  • Comfortable working environment (Every new hire gets a brand new Macbook Pro and 2 screens!)
  • Diverse and friendly working culture. Members of our team come from over 20 nationalities worldwide!

 

Ascenda is an equal opportunity employer, committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace.

CongTy: ONE Tech Stop Vietnam Company Ltd
YeuCau:
SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
  • Good communication skills in English.
  • Sharp attention to detail and strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Knowledge of quality assurance terminology, methods, and tools.
  • Demonstrated knowledge of testing best practices, version control practices, and defect management practices.
  • Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodology and how QA functions within it.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

  • Having coding skill
  • Experience with test automation tools, such as Selenium, Gherkin, Specflow, Postman, SoapUI, etc.
  • Familiarity with git and version control tools.
  • Professional certification in the Quality Assurance field.
MoTa:
JOB PURPOSE

  • The quality gatekeeper, responsible for ensuring that software is being delivered with the highest quality standards. The main mission is to reach quality excellence by having no issues in production as a continuous target.
  • The QA Engineer should know and understand the business details, being able to check whether the final result matches all the business expectations.
  • The QA Engineer should create and execute manual and automated test scenarios, provide root cause analyses of defects based on metrics and proactively raise improvements that will enhance the quality of the product.

PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

  • As a member of an Agile team: The main responsibility for the quality of the product. Ensure that the product is delivered with the highest quality by leveraging QA activities along with the scrum phases. Some of the daily basis activities are:
  • Learning the product business and targets
  • Creating and executing Test case documents.
  • Creating and executing test automation scripts (UI testing, API testing, etc).
  • Ensure that the bugs are being properly registered and the root cause is being correctly set.
  • Providing insights to the development team and stakeholders by making quality data visible through quality reports.
  • Proposing actions that will improve the quality of the product.
  • Leading demonstration meetings with the stakeholders.
PhucLoi:
At OTSV, work is a self-fulfillment, we encourage staff to leave their comfort zone, think out of the box, and share their ideas without hesitation. As a team, we analyse and evaluate issues objectively to learn quickly from mistakes.

We believe in ‘fail quick, success quick’ and strive to keep pace with the forefront of technology to digitize ONE’s business.

The designs of our offices embrace our culture of being flexible and open. Unlike a conventional office, we have an open concept with different work areas which encourages collaboration, open-mindedness, and spontaneity.

Each work area has its own charm and aims to make our staff feel as comfortable in the office as they would feel at home. Have a meet-up at the Café amidst the aroma of coffee!
 

You will love working here!

  • Annual Salary Review & Increment
  • 13th-month salary
  • Performance Bonus
  • Social Security co-contribution based on full gross salary
  • Premium health care (Bao Viet Insurance) for employees & dependents (parents or spouse and children).
  • Lunch allowance
  • Free drinks and snacks
  • 17 days of Annual Leave
  • Annual health screening reimbursement: 4,700,000 VND/ year
  • Training and education sponsorship: $1500/year
  • Well-being allowance: 13,800,000/year

YeuCau:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proven experience in software quality assurance.
  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
  • Experience with automated testing tools and their integration into CI/CD pipelines.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Familiarity with Agile/Scrum and DevOps development processes.
MoTa:
Company Overview: Join our dynamic team, where we prioritize quality and excellence in our business application development. We are in search of a dedicated Business Application QA Analyst who will ensure our applications meet the highest standards of reliability, efficiency, and user-friendliness.

  • Requirement Understanding: 
    • Collaborate with product managers and developers to understand application requirements and design.
  • Test Planning & Strategy: 
    • Develop detailed test plans and strategies for functional, integration, and regression testing.
    • Design and implement automated tests where applicable.
  • Test Automation in a DevOps Environment: 
    • Develop and maintain automated test scripts to support continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
    • Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate test automation into deployment processes.
    • Ensure automated tests are executed during the CI/CD process and any failures are addressed promptly.
  • Test Execution:
    • Execute test cases, ensuring the application's performance, reliability, and stability.
    • Identify, log, and prioritize defects and inconsistencies.
  • Quality Control:
    • Review the software development process to ensure quality standards are met.
    • Monitor debugging process results and track quality assurance metrics.
  • Collaboration:
    • Work closely with the development and DevOps teams to ensure quality is maintained throughout the software development lifecycle.
    • Provide feedback and recommendations to developers on software usability and functionality.
  • Documentation & Reporting:
    • Maintain documentation of test results, and provide regular updates on quality metrics.
    • Analyze and report on any patterns or trends in software defects.
  • Continuous Improvement:
    • Stay updated with new testing tools, test strategies, and best practices in a DevOps environment.
    • Recommend improvements in software to enhance user experience.
PhucLoi:
Career Path Benefits 

  • Go with Jeisys Vietnam as a start member, one of the leaders in the rapidly growing medical device industry worldwide.
  • Opportunity to go beyond the home appliance industry using IoT and transform into a key talent in the development of IoT-integrated beauty and medical devices.
  • Welcome for those who want to escape the life of a low-level developer and upgrade to a higher-level, high-spec developer.

The benefits for the employees

  • Competitive salary range.
  • Full salary-based insurance (Social, Health and Unemployment) according to Vietnam Labour Law.
  • Comprehensive health coverage: We offer a health care package with high quality medical care.
  • Generous paid-time-off policy that includes vacation days, sick leave, and public holidays.
  • Employee assistance programs that provide resources and support for personal or work-related challenges. This can include counseling services, stress management programs, financial advice, and more.
  • Flexible work culture, including 1 happy day per month and 2-3 additional shut-downs per year.
  • Up to two team-building per year.
  • Lunch by the cafeteria of the office’s building, sponsored by the company.

YeuCau:

MoTa:
• Không ngừng phát triển “PLM” cung cấp cho ngành may mặc của Nhật Bản.
  • PLM ( Product Lifecycle Management ) là viết tắt của "Quản lý vòng đời sản phẩm". Giúp tiếp cận hoặc thiết lập phần mềm quản lý để quản lý toàn bộ vòng đời của sản phẩm. PLM nhằm mục đích tích hợp và hợp lý hóa các quy trình từ phát triển sản phẩm đến sản xuất, vận hành, bảo trì và xử lý, với mục tiêu nâng cao hiệu quả và chất lượng sản phẩm. Được sử dụng rộng rãi trong ngành sản xuất.

MoTa:
YOU

You want to be an important member of a strong team of other makers who take pride in their work and support each other. As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for handling certain projects and work directly with our US stakeholder. That’s year one. If career growth is important to you, we not only know how to help you with that, it’s what we love to do:

PROJECT DESCRIPTION

Our new project web application PIPELINE and interactive Tool (Pathway & LBM) have been designed from the ground up to provide easy and flexible solutions for customer’s business. PIPELINE delivers:

  • Full master-plan estimates with delta Bills Of Materials reports
  • Purchase orders from lot-specific, as-built reports
  • Managing options for all assets relating to houses, communities and lots
  • Option-on-option scenarios
  • Full array of materials using dynamic assemblies

At Simpson Strong-Tie we value the individual, and the creativity that individuals can bring to the workplace. You join this company for a career, not a job!

  • Work with development team members to develop an effective and efficient build system for enterprise Windows software and Microsoft cloud solutions
  • Create a continuous release strategy and automating the various steps involved in deploying products to our customers
  • Migrate our product teams to Bitbucket and TeamCity CI, define best practices, and share your know-how
  • Define/implement tools and processes to standardize and automate the way project software is developed, built, tested, and deployed;
  • Ensure a homogeneous way of implementing continuous integration and/or continuous delivery across projects;
  • Automate infrastructure deployments and rollbacks for all developed work assuming responsibility for process support;
  • Work across Teams as an expert for infrastructure and hosting.
  • Become the architect of our new cloud hosting infrastructure strategy, help service teams respond quickly and effectively to the customers' business needs.
  • Document technical designs, processes, and create requirement analysis documents.
  • m Labor Code

YeuCau:
1.Educational Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in computer science, information-technology, system analysis or a related study, or equivalent experience.

2. Relevant Knowledge/ Expertise

  • Knowledge of business ecosystems, SaaS, infrastructure as a service (IaaS), platform as a service (PaaS), SOA, APIs, open data, microservices, event-driven IT and predictive analytics.
  • Understanding of business models, operating models, financial models, cost-benefit analysis, budgeting and risk management.
  • Familiarity with enterprise architecture tools, related graphical models, and frameworks.
  • Insight into information management practices, system development life cycle management, IT services management, agile and lean methodologies, infrastructure and operations, and EA and ITIL frameworks.
  • Understanding of various operating models such as project-centric and product-centric and also different types of agile principles, methodologies and frameworks, especially those designed to be scaled at the enterprise level.
  • Awareness of existing, new and emerging technologies, and processing environments.
  • Effective leadership skills with exceptional soft and interpersonal skills, including teamwork, facilitation and negotiation.
  • Strong consulting skills such as targeted communications, engagement management, stakeholder management and business development. 
  • Mastery of all components of enterprise architecture, business & IT principles and processes.

3. Skills:

  • Excellent analytical, planning and organizational skills. Organizationally savvy, with situational and contextual intelligence of the political climate of the enterprise and how to navigate obstacles and politics.
  • Balances the long-term (“big picture”) and short-term implications of individual decisions and organization goals.
  • Estimates the financial impact of EA alternatives and applies multiple solutions to business problems.
  • Rapidly comprehends the functions and capabilities of new technologies.

4. Relevant Experience

  • 8 or more years of business experience in strategic and operations planning and/or business analysis or experience as an enterprise architecture consultant.
  • 8 or more years of experience in at least three disciplines, such as business, information, solution or technical architecture, application development, middleware, information analysis, database management or operations in a multitier environment.
MoTa:
JOB PURPOSE:

The enterprise architect proactively and holistically helps and guides the enterprise leaders, product managers, product owners and distributed product delivery teams through transformation and optimization initiatives, supporting the formulation of business strategy, outcomes and capabilities. The enterprise architect’s scope of activities could include helping the organization achieve targeted business outcomes related to growing revenue, optimizing costs, mitigating risks and improving sustainability. They focus on development of the business and IT strategy and enterprise architecture of the organization as a whole.

The enterprise architect must:

  • Facilitate alignment between business and IT, and across the democratized IT landscape 
  • Engage business and IT stakeholders, building and maintaining relationships
  • Adapt to changing business and operating models
  • Analyze trends and disruptions, and assess their impact on targeted business outcomes
  • Tell stories to visualize the future state and trigger long-term planning
  • Support various operating models such as project-centric and product-centric 
  • Communicate the value of enterprise architecture, and its portfolio of services
  • Drive the evolution of the EA teams services and operating model
  • Coach and mentor other architects, product owners/managers and business stakeholders to instill architectural thinking

1. Strategy Formulation and Execution:

  • Guides business stakeholders in developing strategies and adapting to digital transformation.
  • Constructs business models and connects them to execution for achieving targeted outcomes.

2. Relationship Building:

  • Shapes the value proposition for Enterprise Architecture (EA) as an internal consultancy.
  • Advises stakeholders on investment decisions and manages cross-functional relationships.

3. Orchestrating Business Outcomes:

  • Develops the EA practice to align with business and IT strategies.
  • Identifies gaps and recommends solutions to drive business outcomes.

4. Innovation Facilitation:

  • Identifies disruptive forces and assesses trends to enhance strategic decision-making.
  • Guides the execution of innovations and tracks their integration into operations.

5. IT Portfolio Management:

  • Maintains alignment across architecture activities and develops IT investment roadmaps.
  • Supports solutions design and delivery, ensuring consistency with enterprise architecture.
PhucLoi:

In essence of joining our company, you will be given the scope to seize every opportunity and helped to acquire specific competencies you’ll need to succeed either you wish to go wide or go deep. Our company prides ourselves on our underpinned principle of nurturing people in not only HR policies but also in our culture. We value innovations and we need people to work on initiatives and carry on our business vision of operating excellence and market leadership.

Alongside with these, we believe our staff members deserve a good working condition, so that in addition to social health insurance you will be accessible to health and accident insurance and will be eligible to join in team building every year. We also value your efforts; for this reason, we give you both financial and non-financial rewards such as: KPI bonus, Best Initiatives, Best performer or Best manager of the year, etc.

In the scope of ProcureTech, our Procurement is responsible for state-of-the-art technology that leverages data, AI and advanced technologies to align traveler experiences with the corporate programs of customers. The teams work on high volume data load to enable travel managers and procurement officers to gain deep insights into their travel programs' performance and make data-driven decisions to continually optimize their travel policies to match the strategy of our customers.

 

We are looking for a Team Lead Engineering JAVA who loves data and to transform it into valuable information. You work on one of our core systems and implement our procurement application, which thousands of clients use, to create and manage their hotel RFPs.

  • Coach engineers to leverage generative AI tools such as GitHub Copilot, Amazon Code Whisperer, etc., to accelerate software delivery
  • Collaborate across teams with regards to overarching technical concepts and practices 
  • Participate in the full development cycle: design, development, QA, experimentation, analysis, and launch. You’ll be reviewing code, writing design docs, giving feedback on product specs and mocks, and generally helping out wherever is needed.

YeuCau:
Required Competencies 

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  • Significant experience with at least 05+ years of experience in an engineering management role, preferably in a startup or fast-paced tech environment.
  • Strong technical background with proficiency in at least one of these technical stack: AI, games development, C programming languages, Mixed-Reality etc., that is relevant to Bootloader Studio.
  • Strong understanding of software development life cycles, agile methodologies, and best practices in software engineering.
  • Proven leadership skills with a track record of mentoring and developing engineering teams.
  • Excellent problem-solving, organizational, and analytical skills.
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
  • Ability to motivate and inspire teams
  • A team player, a servant leader that empowers team members, allowing autonomy and responsibility while providing necessary support and in complex situation, making sound decisions under pressure
MoTa:
About the Role

Step into the future with our game-changing startup!  We're pushing the boundaries of mixed reality and AI. Using the Apple Vision Pro headset, we're crafting a new kind of interactive mixed-reality experience.  What we’re building is not a traditional game, but uses elements of what typically goes into a game, including art, animation, AI / ML, and user interaction. Our goal is to create an engaging and emotionally uplifting experience.  Our product will be an example of the successful deployment of Affective AI.

We have an experienced leadership team and excellent technical contributors.  

What are we missing? A person like you. As our Engineering Manager, you'll be the driving force behind the operational excellence of our engineering team of 20 talented members across 3 time zones. Your role is pivotal in managing the 'how' of our engineering processes, focusing on the methodologies, team dynamics, and best practices that enable our engineers to excel.

If you’re excited by our mission, and if you share our love for mixed reality and Affective AI, then let's chat.  Together, we’ll be able to bring a new kind of mixed-reality experience to life.

Key Responsibilities

Operational Leadership: 

  • Lead the operational aspects of the engineering team, encompassing AI, front-end, back-end, quality assurance, and web development. Concentrate on refining methodologies, processes, tools, and enhancing the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the team.
  • Foster a culture of collaboration, continuous improvement, and knowledge sharing within the engineering team.
  • Coordinate with project leads to identify challenges, mitigate risks, and devise solutions, ensuring success across multiple projects.

Team Development: 

  • Manage the professional development and growth of the engineering team. This includes providing feedback, mentoring, coaching, and providing career development guidance. 

Process Optimization: 

  • Implement and oversee best practices in engineering processes, ensuring consistent standards and high-quality outputs.

Resource Management: 

  • Efficiently hire, allocate and manage resources, including personnel and technology, to maximize productivity.

Collaboration and Communication: 

  • Foster a collaborative environment and maintain effective communication channels within the team. 
  • Collaborate with leads from cross-functional teams, including product, art, animation, and product operations, to align on project goals, prioritize tasks, and facilitate the delivery of high-quality products/services across multiple projects.
  • Act as a liaison between technical and non-technical teams, effectively communicating complex technical concepts to diverse stakeholders.

Performance Management: 

  • Regularly assess team performance, identify areas for improvement, and implement strategies to address challenges.
PhucLoi:
• Very attractive salary and benefits – we pay well.
  • Sign-on bonuses are offered to offset the potential loss of performance-based bonuses, 13th month bonus
  • 19-days annual leave
  • 13th month bonus
  • Stock Options for critical contributors
  • Premium Healthcare Insurance (Bao Viet) for employees
  • Convenient central District 1 office location
  • Work with meaning & fun – your work will impact millions of users, in a positive way.
  • International, dynamic, friendly working environment
  • Meaningful work with passionate colleagues

Why choose us?

Our stealth-mode startup, guided by seasoned leaders, seeks skilled professionals like you to advance our mission. We're developing a novel approach that uses Affective AI to engage humans in a positive emotional way...in mixed reality. Your expertise is essential for our success.

Work Environment

  • Teamwork makes the dream work, so at bootloader studio we pay very close attention to the work environment to curate it into a happy, healthy, productive environment.
  • 100% product/innovation-focused startup company with experienced founders
  • Flat organization – don’t come to work for us if you want or need minions working for you!
  • Open communication – we listen to each other
  • Comfortable, modern, beautiful offices full of the newest tech gears

Equal Employment

We are an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We believe in treating all employees and applicants with fairness and respect, regardless of their race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic.

We value the unique perspectives and experiences that each individual brings, as it enhances our team's creativity and innovation. Join us and be part of an organization that upholds equal employment opportunities for all.

Our platform, Starion, is a testament to our commitment in the no-code market. We are a small team, passionate and dedicated, thriving in the startup atmosphere, and looking to welcome a skilled React Native Developer to our ranks.

Role Description

We are on the lookout for a React Native Developer to take charge of our mobile app development at Unstatic. In this role, you will:

  • Utilize MobX for state management to ensure seamless user experiences.
  • Implement new features, while also maintaining and upgrading existing functionalities.
  • Contribute to the ongoing enhancement of our platform’s performance and responsiveness.

  • Experience with Cross-Platform PC and Mobile development (macOS, Windows, iOS, Android).
  • Good experience in RESTful APIs, Security, Authentication, design, and implementation
  • Strong experience architecting, developing, and deploying modern architectural patterns/techniques (Microservices, DDD, TDD ...)
  • Good experience on engineering practices (CI/CD and Software Testing)

MoTa:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION

Outdoor spaces offer great opportunities for connection, creativity, and contemplation. Whether you are taking on a project for the love of the challenge, in need of a place to unwind, or for building bonds with family or friends — a strong, beautiful outdoor structure can make all the difference. From ideas to tools to plans, we are here to help you create the spaces that make life better. 

Our new project software Outdoor Living Solution (OLS) has been designed from the ground up to provide easy and flexible solutions for customers’ business. OLS includes 3 apps Deck Planner, Pergola Planner and Fence Planner that delivers:

  • Our software makes planning and designing a new deck, pergola, or other outdoor structure quick and easy.
  • In styles from traditional to contemporary, we have products, plans, and guides to help you build your outdoor living space.

At Simpson Strong-Tie we value the individual, and the creativity that individuals can bring to the workplace. You join this company for a career, not a job!

1.Technical Solution (70%)

  • Experience in profiling and optimizing source code and render performance (GPU and CPU)
  • Understanding of UX design process, and experience working with UX development team
  • Take control of the whole product's features and components, as well as lead the product design and code parts.

  • Identify bottlenecks in processes and applications and execute solutions in a timely way.
  • Take ownership of the features and components in a project lifecycle and lead the product design and coding.
  • Master in Deploy and Release process with pre-defined Backout Plan and Rollout Strategy.
  • Familiar with operational model for Incident support (L1, L2, L3) and KPI Tracking.
  • Be an integral part of the application development team, with special emphasis on implementing the business logic and data access layer of application code (AR/VR , Unity, C#, VB and ASP.NET, etc.)
  • Design technology architecture and execute solutions, and be a major contributor to the product's overall architectural direction.

2. Project execution (20%)

  • Assist the development process by contributing suggestions for improvements and by driving the quality of code throughout production.
  • Partner with art, design, and production teams to ensure that goals and schedules are compatible with business and project needs.
  • In charge of the implementation of new technologies and providing recommendations and inform stakeholders about potential threats.
  • Identify the technical risk and planning mitigation actions with regard to the risk impact and other priorities.
  • Coordinate with Stakeholders, Vendor and QA Team to make sure the project executing smoothly.
  • Lead project team to work with Vendor (UK), Product Owner (US) and B2B Customers.

3. Leadership (10%)

  • Collaborate with other team members in delivering complex features on time and at high standards.
  • Assist with the hiring process for additional team members.
